Title: COMPUTER BASICS
Discription: HEXAS Basic Computer Skills Program covers all the bases and provides you with a certificate that shows prospective employees you are proficient in using computers and their software to complete a variety of tasks. You will learn how to use the internet, keyboard, email, USB drive and, of course, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Access
